paper_abstract: Long Code testing is a fundamental problem in the area of property testing and hardness of approximation. In this paper, we study how small the soundness s of the Long Code test with perfect completeness can be by using non-adaptive q queries. We show that s = (2q + 3)/2(q) is possible, where q is of the form 2k-1 for any integer k > 2. (c) 2014 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 45, 703-723, 2014
paper_title: A Query Efficient Non-Adaptive Long Code Test with Perfect Completeness
